job_history.work_description: Supported Regional Finance Manager with special projects and other responsibilities as assigned. Handled monthly accrual process for 22 expense accounts. Full responsibility for all fixed assets; maintained detailed depreciation schedules. Conducted monthly reconciliations of all balance sheet accounts to ensure their accuracy. Reconciled 4 bank accounts (250+ transactions per month), researched and resolved all issues.

Worked closely under the supervision of the Controller and Director of Accounting. Experience in GAAP accounting and monthly closing processes. Researched and resolved financial inquiries from management at 48 campus locations. Reconciliation of 40 bank accounts on a monthly basis. Posted necessary monthly journal entries to the general ledger (Great Plains Dynamics). Compiled and analyzed transactions primarily related to: cash, fixed assets, inventory & sales tax.

Implemented the accounting process, policies and procedures in accordance with US GAAP. Bank account maintenance and financial transactions oversight. Developed the annual budget and analyzed actual revenue and expenses against the budget. Kept the board informed of trends, concerns, assessments of organization financial health. Completion of all financial reports in a timely manner and made available to the board.

Researched and implemented a new remote deposit banking system. Processed an average of 200 checks on a daily basis via a bank remote system. Created and balanced several accounting spreadsheets. Prepared and managed reports for executive management. Posted month and year end journal entries. Researched, verified and corrected the validity of account discrepancies. Worked with various departments and built stronger working relationships organization wide.

Project VPO: Assessed 2500 foreign accounts within a 6 month period. Achieved and maintained a 90% Customer Satisfaction rating. Verified and researched data for 500 Savings Bonds accounts on a daily basis. Tracked and updated non-nationals accounts preventing over one million dollars in fines. Indexed, verified and scanned 1200 IRA accounts on a monthly basis. Keyed interest and tax rates for over 350 accounts holders daily.

skills.name: Financial Reconciliation
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience handling monthly reconciliations of balance sheet accounts and bank accounts, showing expert-level mastery.

skills.name: General Accounting
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience with all aspects of accounting including GAAP accounting, monthly closing processes, and financial transactions, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: No direct experience with payroll management mentioned in the job history.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Developed the annual budget and analyzed actual revenue and expenses against the budget as a Treasurer, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Worked under the supervision of the Controller and Director of Accounting, and implemented accounting process, policies and procedures as a Treasurer, showing a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: No direct experience with Microsoft Excel mentioned in the job history.

skills.name: GAAP Accounting
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience with GAAP accounting and monthly closing processes, showing expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.explanation: Completed all financial reports in a timely manner and made available to the board as a Treasurer, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Verified and researched data for 500 Savings Bonds accounts on a daily basis, and tracked and updated non-nationals accounts preventing over one million dollars in fines as a Data Analyst Assistant, showing strong proficiency.
